meanings.definition: A plant of the mallow family with pink or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The mallow in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I picked a mallow flower for my mom.
meanings.sent3: The bees love buzzing around the mallow in the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a blooming mallow.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the mallow swayed in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A sweet, soft, chewy candy made from sugar, corn syrup, and gelatin.
meanings.sent1: I bought a bag of mallows at the store.
meanings.sent2: She shared a mallow with her friend during the movie.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they played with the sticky mallows.
meanings.sent4: The sweet aroma of mallows filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The colorful mallows melted in my mouth with each bite.
